name: Shell Marine Gear Fluid S2 GX 220

globalDocs.name: Marine Gear Fluid S2 GX 220 EN TDG V1.1 24-Apr-2023

localDocs.name: Marine Gear Fluid S2 GX 220 Singapore English

marketing: Shell Marine Gear Fluid S2 GX oils are high quality extreme-pressure (EP) oils designed primarily for the lubrication of heavy duty marine gearboxes. Their high load carrying capacity, protection against micropitting and compatibility with seals and paints, combine to offer excellent performance in enclosed gear applications.
